actions.name: Toxtricified
actions.description: Effect: If the user has an ATK, SPATK, or SPD beneficial Nature, they are always in their Amped Up Forme, and if they have a HP, DEF, SPDEF beneficial Nature, they are always in their Low Key Forme. While in Amped Up Forme, the user's Electric-Type and/or [Sonic] attacks have their Power increased by 20% and the user possesses the Plus Ability. While in Low Key Forme, the user has +1 default ACC and EVA Stages, and possesses the Minus Ability.
